item.description:
Not sure if anyone has plans for New Years but if not my wife and I would love for people to join us in ringing in 2010! We are hosting a night of fun, cards, drinks and appetizers at our place in Hingham which is located on the South Shore area off of 3A. For more information please email me also once guest list is set an additional email will go out with directions.

One request, limited space is available to about 15 people on a first come first serve basis so if you know this is something that you would be interested in attending RSVP immediately.

For those that we don't see on that night we want to wish you happy holidays and look forward to seeing you at future events in the coming year!
item.name: New Years Eve Euchre/Cards Night
